## Karma Rewards:
- Short lore (< 100 words): +15 karma
- Medium lore (100-300 words): +25 karma
- Long lore (300+ words): +35 karma
- Accepted into LORE.md: +50 bonus
- Creates new character: +20 bonus
- Connects multiple elements: +15 bonus
